title: Cookie Clicker: Steps & Tips to Unlocking and Getting Sugar Lumps

steps.title: Bake one billion cookies.
steps.content: Bake one billion cookies. In order to unlock Sugar Lumps, you must bake at least one billion cookies. Once you do this, you'll get a pop-up in game explaining that you have unlocked Sugar Lumps and that they have immediately started growing. [1] X Research source

steps.title: Tap on mature or ripe Sugar Lumps to harvest them.
steps.content: Tap on mature or ripe Sugar Lumps to harvest them. You can harvest a Sugar Lump as soon as it's matured, but there is a 50% chance that you won't get any Lumps this way. If you allow a Sugar Lump to fully ripen, you are guaranteed to get Lumps. If you don't tap on a ripened Sugar Lump, it will fall, and the Sugar Lumps will be automatically harvested for you. This happens even when the game is closed. It takes 20 hours for a Sugar Lump to mature, 3 hours to ripen, and 1 hour to fall.

steps.title: Use an alternative method.
steps.content: Use an alternative method. There are three other ways you can get Sugar Lumps: Get the "Sweet" effect after tapping on a Golden Cookie or Wrath Cookie. You have about a 0.01% chance of getting the "Sweet" effect, which grants you one Sugar Lump. Harvest a mature Juicy Queenbeet in the Garden. This will get you one Sugar Lump. Sacrifice your Garden after you get every seed. This will get you 10 Sugar Lumps.

steps.title: Normal Sugar Lumps.
steps.content: Normal Sugar Lumps. These are the most common types of Sugar Lumps. When harvested, they will always give 1 Sugar Lump.

steps.title: Bifurcated Sugar Lumps.
steps.content: Bifurcated Sugar Lumps. When harvested, you have a 50% chance of getting 1 Sugar Lump and 50% chance of getting 2 Sugar Lumps. If you have the Sucralosia Inutilis Heavenly Upgrade, the chance of getting 2 Lumps increases to 52.5% (and the chance of getting 1 Lump is lowered in turn).

steps.title: Caramelized Sugar Lumps.
steps.content: Caramelized Sugar Lumps. This Sugar Lump gives you an equal chance of getting 1 to 3 Sugar Lumps when harvested. Harvesting this Sugar Lump will also give an effect that refills all of your Sugar Lump cooldowns.

steps.title: Golden Sugar Lumps.
steps.content: Golden Sugar Lumps. The rarest type of Sugar Lump, these Lumps will give 2 to 7 Sugar Lumps when harvested. When you harvest a Golden Sugar Lump, all the cookies in your bank are doubled and you get the "Sugar Blessing" effect, which makes Golden Cookies 10% more likely to appear for 24 hours.

steps.title: Meaty Sugar Lumps.
steps.content: Meaty Sugar Lumps. These Sugar Lumps only drop during the Grandmapocalypse event. The Meaty Sugar Lump has a 40% chance to drop either 0 or 2 Sugar Lumps, and a 20% chance to drop 1 Sugar Lump.
